name: Playing with Blood
description:
Playing with Blood
Unlock Blood Magic: Alchemical Wizardy and EvilCraft, featuring the return of 1.7.10 Essences.

quests.name: Tier 3 Essences
quests.description: Craft one of each of the Tier 3 Essences. This requires at least the Magician Blood Orb, although higher tiers can be used.

quests.name: Smelling Stones
quests.description: Craft 24 Stone Brick Paths, and place them down in 2x3s extending from the Wooden Paths. They are valid up to one block above or below the level of the Wooden Paths. In the new 64 blocks of valid space, place various crops and other natural things to increase the amount of Tranquility, up to a maximum of 120. Remember that variation is important, as there is diminishing value from the same type of block.

quests.name: Reinforce the Altar
quests.description:
Runes can be used interchangably with Blank Runes to form a Blood Altar structure.
The Rune of Self Sacrifice increases the amount of LP the player supplies when using a dagger by 10%, additively.
The Speed Rune increases the speed of crafting and filling Blood Orbs happens at by 20%, additively.

quests.name: Red and Ready
quests.description: Craft the Frozen Blood Core, and weep for what you have wrought.
Did not break, must investigate further.

quests.name: Maintaining in Despite
quests.description: Craft a Promise of Tenacity II. This can be used in a couple EvilCraft machines, but most importantly in the Blood Infuser, where it unlocks new recipes. Replaces the Promise of Tenacity I.

quests.name: Gleaming red
quests.description: Place down five sources of blood, and toss a Dark Gem into it. It will consume all 5 buckets of blood to produce a single Dark Power Gem.

quests.name: Soul Smith
quests.description: Create a Soul Forge. It has 4 slots for items to craft, a slot in the center for the crafting result, a bar to display crafting progress, and a space for a Tartaric Gem.

quests.name: Blood doesn't grow on trees!
quests.description: It grows in them. And it hungers.

quests.name: Gork
quests.description: When killing mobs with a Blood Extractor in your inventory, it will gain blood. The Blood Extractor can be used like a bucket to place down the blood into the world, and can also auto-supply any tank that can hold blood in your inventory. If you combine it with itself it will increase its internal tank.

quests.name: The Magician will suffer
quests.description: The Magician's Blood Orb fills your personal network up to 150,000 LP.

quests.name: Mork
quests.description: The Blood Altar consumes Life Essence to convert items. It has multiple tiers, and some recipes are locked behind higher tiers.

quests.name: They Merge into a Common Soul
quests.description: Craft a Common Tartaric Gem, which can hold up to 1024 Demonic Will, unlocking the ability to craft more expensive recipes with it.

quests.name: Funky Potions
quests.description: Craft an Alchemy Table. The size of two blocks, this has 6 input slots, 1 output slot, and a Blood Orb slot. It requires a bound Blood Orb, and consumes LP from the bound player to craft items. The tier of the Blood Orb affects what items can be crafted.

quests.name: They see you
quests.description: This will allow you to see Vengeance Spirits, but also allow them to see - and attack - you. If you enable the ring, you get multiple positive effects, but Vengeance Spirits will constantly spawn around you.

quests.name: Running Red
quests.description: Craft a Blood Infuser. This is the fundamental machine in EvilCraft. It can craft more items and store more blood at higher tiers, which are gained through Promises of Tenacity.

quests.name: A Bite of Darkness
quests.description: WARNING: DO NOT EAT. Enjoyed by animals about to read a book.

quests.name: THE LAST CRAFTING*
quests.description: *Not actually the last crafting. Terms and conditions may apply. Extended use may cause excessive particles. Please consult a doctor to see if Ender Crafting is right for you. If crafting lasts longer than 3 minutes contact a doctor and install more Ender Alternators.

quests.name: The Apprentice will bleed
quests.description: The Apprentice's Blood Orb fills your personal network up to 25,000 LP.

quests.name: Bloodomation
quests.description: Sucks up Blood from the ground in puts it into nearby tanks, or, more usefully, when the Spiked Plate does damage to a mob.

quests.name: Bloody Heart
quests.description: Light Hardened Blood on fire to get Hardened Blood Shards, and use these to craft a Blood Infusion Core, the throbbing heart of many EvilCraft machines.

quests.name: Meets a Slightly Larger Soul
quests.description: Craft a Lesser Tartaric Gem, which can hold up to 256 Demonic Will, unlocking the ability to craft more expensive recipes with it.

quests.name: Reinforced
quests.description: Craft a Reinfoced Slate in your tier 2 Blood Altar.

quests.name: The Weak will die
quests.description: The Weak Blood Orb fills your personal network up to 5,000 LP. Bind to you by right clicking with it.

quests.name: Glod's Guarantee
quests.description: Using a Promise of Tenacity I, use an Empowered Glod Block with a full tank of Blood to get a Gold Promise Acceptor.

quests.name: When will it end?
quests.description: Kill an Enderman and have him spawn a Vengeance Spirit, and then use the Vengeance Focus and a Box of Eternal Closure to trap an Enderman to make a Block of Ender.

quests.name: When Small Soul
quests.description: Craft a Petty Tartaric Gem (I suggest two or three). The Petty Tartaric Gem holds up to 64 Demonic Will, and will automatically absorb Demonic Will you pick up. You can transfer will between Tartaric Gems by holding right click with it in your hand.

quests.name: Runes for the Altar
quests.description: Craft 8 Blood Runes, which are used to increase the tier of the Blood Altar. I suggest using the Inspectoris Scandalum to see where to place the blocks. Right click to change the tier it displays, and shift+right click on a Blood Altar to display it.

quests.name: Do it Tomorrow
quests.description: Can stack up to 3 slots of 4 in a single Promise of Tenacity III machine, allowing for incredibly efficient operations.

quests.name: Tier 2 Reagents
quests.description: Craft one of each of the Tier 2 Reagents.

quests.name: True Vengeance
quests.description: At long last, you can kill the Vengeance Spirits. They drop extra goodies too!

quests.name: Tier 2 Essences
quests.description: Craft one of each of the Tier 2 Essences. This requires at least the Apprentice Blood Orb, although higher tiers can be used.

quests.name: Red "Meat"
quests.description: Using Coagulated Blood from Tinkers Construct, make a Hardened Blood Droplet.

quests.name: To gain, lose
quests.description: Using the Sacrificial Dagger near a Blood Altar will reduce your life, and fill up the Blood Altar in exchange.

quests.name: Locked Away
quests.description: Craft a Box of Eternal Closure. By default, it comes with a Vengeance Spirit inside. Place it down and right click on it to open it. Shoot a spirit with a Vengeance Focus to trap it inside the box.

quests.name: Burnt Out
quests.description: Craft Arcane Ashes. This 10 durability tool will create an special crafting location when right clicked on the ground. Place two items in it and it will make some cool effects and craft an item, typically a Sigil, for you. Some items will cause it to become an Alchemy Array, which give unique and special effects (look in the guidebook).

quests.name: Tier 3 Reagents
quests.description: Craft one of each of the Tier 3 Reagets.

quests.name: Know Thy God
quests.description: The Sigil of Divination will allow you to view new information about various Blood Magic blocks when held. Its main uses are finding out how much LP is in your personal network by right clicking, how much Blood is in the Blood Altar, and the Tranquility of an Incense Altar.

quests.name: Barely Hanging On
quests.description: Craft a Promise of Tenacity I. This can be used in a couple EvilCraft machines, but most importantly in the Blood Infuser, where it unlocks new recipes.

quests.name: You shoot them
quests.description: Shooting a Vengeance Spirit won't kill it, but it will weaken it enough that a nearby open Box of Eternal Closure can suck them in.

quests.name: Sniff the Wood
quests.description: Craft 36 Wooden Paths, and place them down in 3x3s in each cardinal direction from the Incense Altar, up to one block above or below the original level. In the diagonal 3x3 areas, place various crops and other natural things to increase the amount of Tranquility, up to a maximum of 60. Note that variation is important, as there is diminishing value from the same type of block.

quests.name: Diamatine's Duty
quests.description: Using a Promise of Tenacity II, use an Empowered Diamantine Block with a full tank of Blood to get a Diamond Promise Acceptor.

quests.name: Tier 1 Reagents
quests.description: Craft one of each of the Tier 1 Reagents.

quests.name: Hung with Madness
quests.description: Craft the Coralium Decorated Blood Star, and scream the madness you hath seen.

quests.name: S P E E D W A L K E R
quests.description: The Effortless Ring gives auto-step, makes your hunger reduce slower, and makes you walk a bit faster. It can be equipped as a bauble.

quests.name: From Snow White
quests.description: After feeding the apple to an animal, let it die and throw a Book onto the resulting particles. This is the guidebook for Evilcraft.

quests.name: Enduring Eternally
quests.description: Craft a Promise of Tenacity III. This can be used in a couple EvilCraft machines, but most importantly in the Blood Infuser, where it unlocks new recipes. Replaces the Promise of Tenacity II.

quests.name: Burning Candles
quests.description: Place the Incense Altar on a 3x3 square. By default, it has 20 Tranquility, which will give you a 20% bonus to the value of blood sacrificed when nearby. Your Sacrificial Dagger will become enhanced when this is active, and will take 90% of your health. This has a cooldown of 20 seconds due the Soul Fray effect.

quests.name: Snared
quests.description:
Right click to throw a Rudimentary Snare. Any mob it hits will have a chance to gain a particle effect, which will cause the mob to drop Demonic Will.
The value of Demonic Will increases with the health of the mob.

quests.name: Imbue the Altar
quests.description:
Runes can be used interchangably with Blank Runes to form a Blood Altar structure.
The Rune of Sacrifice increases the amount of LP the Dagger of Sacrifice (or Well of Suffering later on) supplies by 10%, additively.
The Rune of Capacity increases the capacity of your Blood Altar by 2,000 LP, additively.

quests.name: It thirsts for souls
quests.description: Craft the Sentient Sword. Mobs killed by the Sentient Sword will always drop Demonic Will. The Sentient Sword, and other Sentient Tools, increase in power the more Demonic Will you have in your largest Tartaric Gem.

quests.name: Imbued
quests.description: Create Imbued Slates using your tier 3 Blood Altar

quests.name: Tier 1 Essences
quests.description: Craft one of each of the Tier 1 Essences. This requires at least the Weak Blood Orb, although higher tiers can be used.

quests.name: Any%
quests.description: Can stack up to 3 slots of 4 in a single Promise of Tenacity III machine, allowing for incredibly fast operations.

quests.name: Overflowing Oaths
quests.description: Your every word a vow, your every breath a promise.

quests.name: Enori's Esimorp
quests.description: Using the Blood Infuser, use an Empowered Enori Block with a full tank of Blood to get an Iron Promise Acceptor.

quests.name: Wheel Attempt #374
quests.description: Response when fall from big cliff same as #369, #370, #371, #372, and #373. Further investigations still needed.

quests.name: Absent Assurances
quests.description: You vaugely gesture at the possibility of you following up.

quests.name: Dull as Dust
quests.description: Create Dull Dust, and then Infuse it to get Bloodied Dust, an essential crafting component.
